extends java.lang.Object

      • judgeWall

        public boolean[] judgeWall(int x,
                           int y)
        Determine whether the four directions of the player's current location are walls.
        Parameters:
        x - The x-asis position.
        y - The y-asis position.
        Returns:
        A boolean array, [up is wall or not, left is wall or not, right is wall or not, down is wall or not]
